ModMetaData.name: Economic Stability
ModMetaData.author: AngleWyrm
ModMetaData.description: Stabilizes market prices. Tired of getting stiffed by traders? Stiff them back! This mod gives the player the ability to sell items at the same 50% mark-up to market value that other traders charge. Credits xyzzy for the adorable devil girl artwork; see more of her art at http://xyzzy.deviantart.com
